newsitem.title: USA: Aqua Care to buy Duriron division.
newsitem.headline: Aqua Care to buy Duriron division.

text.p: Aqua Care Systems Inc said Wednesday it had signed a letter of intent to buy the assets and assume certain liabilities of the filtration systems division of Duriron Co Inc.
Closing of the transaction is expected by March 31, it said.
Closing is subject to a definitive purchase agreement and Aqua Care's financing arrangements.
William Mackey, chairman and chief executive of Aqua Care, said the acquisition will complement his company's products in the water filtration, purification and wastewater treatment businesses.
William Jordan, chairman and chief executive of Duriron, said the division is a small part of its global business and does not fit the company's strategic direction.
Jordan said the sale of the division will help Duriron focus more management attention on its core businesses, which produce fluid handling products used by chemical process industries.
